API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.core.data.Polygon

type
class
implements
sandy.core.scenegraph.IDisplayable
version
3.1
since
1.0
Polygon's are the building blocks of visible 3D shapes.

Static Variables

POLYGON_MAP : IntHash<Polygon>

This property lists all the polygons. This is an helping property since it allows to retrieve a polygon instance from its unique ID. Polygon objects have an unique ID with myPolygon.id. Using : Polygon.POLYGON_MAPmyPolygon.id returns myPolygon (for sure this example has no interesst except showing the use of the property.

Constructor

new()
parameters
p_oShape The shape this polygon belongs to
p_geometry The geometry this polygon is part of
p_aVertexID The vertexID array of this polygon
p_aUVCoordsID The UVCoordsID array of this polygon
p_nFaceNormalID The faceNormalID of this polygon
p_nEdgesID The edgesID of this polygon
Creates a new polygon.

_startMouseInteraction(default,method) : ?e : flash.events.MouseEvent -> Void

_stopMouseInteraction(default,method) : ?e : flash.events.MouseEvent -> Void

a : Vertex

aEdges : Array<Edge3D>

An array of the polygon's edges.

aNeighboors : Array<Polygon>

An array of polygons that share an edge with this polygon.

aUVCoord : Array<UVCoord>

addEventListener(default,method) : p_sEvent : String -> oL : Dynamic -> arguments : Array<Dynamic> -> Void

Adds a listener for specifical event.

appearance(__getAppearance,__setAppearance) : sandy.materials.Appearance

The appearance of this polygon.

area(__getArea,null) : Float

b : Vertex

broadcaster(__getBroadcaster,null) : sandy.events.BubbleEventBroadcaster

The broadcaster property.

The broadcaster is the property used to send events to listeners.

c : Vertex

caUVCoord : Array<UVCoord>

changed(__getChanged,__setChanged) : Bool

clear(default,method) : Void -> Void

Clears the polygon's container.

clip(default,method) : p_oFrustum : sandy.view.Frustum -> Array<Vertex>

Clips the polygon.

clipFrontPlane(default,method) : p_oFrustum : sandy.view.Frustum -> Array<Vertex>

Perform a clipping against the near frustum plane.

container(__getContainer,null) : flash.display.Sprite

The container for this polygon.

createNormal(default,method) : Void -> Point3D

Returns the transformed normal Point3D of the polygon.

createTransformedNormal(default,method) : Void -> Point3D

Returns the transformed normal Point3D of the polygon.

cvertices : Array<Vertex>

An array of clipped vertices. Check the isClipped property first to see if this array will contain the useful data.

d : Vertex

depth(__getDepth,__setDepth) : Float

The depth of the polygon.

destroy(default,method) : Void -> Void

Destroys the sprite attache to this polygon.

display(default,method) : ?p_oContainer : flash.display.Sprite -> Void

Draws the polygon on its container if visible.

enableEvents(__getEnableEvents,__setEnableEvents) : Bool

Specifies whether mouse events are enabled for this polygon.

To apply events to a polygon, listeners must be added with the addEventListener() method.

enableInteractivity(__getEnableInteractivity,__setEnableInteractivity) : Bool

Specifies whether MouseEvent.ROLL_* events are enabled for this polygon.

To apply events to a polygon, listeners must be added with the addEventListener() method.

get3DFrom2D(default,method) : p_oScreenPoint : flash.geom.Point -> Point3D

Returns a Point3D (3D position) on the polygon relative to the specified point on the 2D screen.

getUVFrom2D(default,method) : p_oScreenPoint : flash.geom.Point -> UVCoord

Returns a UV coordinate elative to the specified point on the 2D screen.

id : Int

READ-ONLY property Unique polygon ID Number.

isClipped : Bool

READ-ONLY property. Specify if the polygon has been clipped

material(__getMaterial,__setMaterial) : sandy.materials.Material

Returns the material currently used by the renderer

minZ : Float

Minimum depth value of that polygon in the camera space

normal(__getNormal,__setNormal) : Vertex

precompute(default,method) : Void -> Void

Computes several properties of the polygon.

The computed properties are listed below:

  • visible
  • minZ
  • depth

removeEventListener(default,method) : p_sEvent : String -> oL : Dynamic -> Void

Removes a listener for specifical event.

scene(__getScene,__setScene) : sandy.core.Scene3D

A reference to the Scene3D object this polygon is in.

shape : sandy.core.scenegraph.Shape3D

READ-ONLY property. Link to the Shape3D instance this polygon is related too.

swapCulling(default,method) : Void -> Void

Changes which side is the "normal" culling side.

The method also swaps the front and back skins.

toString(default,method) : Void -> String

Returns a string representing of this polygon.

update(default,method) : p_aVertexID : Array<Int> -> Void

updateNormal(default,method) : Void -> Void

uvBounds : flash.geom.Rectangle

The texture bounds.

vertexNormals : Array<Vertex>

An array of the polygon's vertex normals.

vertices : Array<Vertex>

Array of original vertices.

visible : Bool

Specifies whether the face of the polygon is visible.
